messages.message:
apps cannot be created on master (aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com (http://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com), crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com (http://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com), crafting dev environments, etc) - see thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1749800117950059)

i think the issue is this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71012)? <!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5> can you take a look? should we revert the PR until @abhijnan can take a look?
Feel free to revert it. I'll take a look later.
@Serena are you planning on doing this? I can as well

i created a PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71406)

but i'm still waiting for services to rebuild in my crafting env to check that this actually fixes the issue :sweat_smile:
yeah, fair
thank you btw!

I might have a forward fix here https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71411.

I try to find these cases earlier, but lack of typing/incorrect typing for our legacy deps makes it really hard to find these out earlier.

> lack of typing/incorrect typing for our legacy deps makes it really hard to find these out earlier
agreed, this seems like a difficult change to make :sweat:
btw i did confirm that i was able to create an app on my revert branch
i can also check out your forward fix and test on your branch? @abhijnan
sure
On another note, I recently added try catch statements so that my changes to traces don't break anything, so this is definitely odd
i tested that your forward fix works! can we merge it?
Yep, that sounds good
Thanks for the help on this

actually, we're still waiting on CI and a review from the observability team :disappointed:

at least we have a branch for people to unblock themselves if they're running into this on their crafting env

CI tends to timeout on these changes :lolcry: 
@sudeep can you help here?
Looking
@Serena there is an open comment from you that seems valid. I do not think Abhijnan is around, so lets merge revert PR to unblock for now. And i will merge fwd fix with him on Monday

<!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5> could i get a stamp on my revert PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71406)?

also i may need to force merge if CI times out - it's been running for over 2 hours, as Abhijnan predicted :lolcry:
im not any of the required approvers but i stamped it anyway
but ig if you have force merge perms it doesnt matterthe most
ok i force-merged the revert!
